strings.Value: "Wait! I come in peace!"
"Easy, easy. We can always fight later. Let's talk first."
[Attack] "There's too many of you here. And I only need one…"
"An alchemist I know is working on a new potion, and the decoction has to be tested. Does any of you wish to risk your life in the name of science?"
"The ruler of these lands wishes to show that all who inhabit them are like children to {mf|him|her}! In {mf|his|her} grace, {mf|he|she} gifts you with this rare, noble drink!"
"As a matter of fact, nothing. I guess I should get going."
"What do you know. I was just looking for a couple of lab rats. Do I have a volunteer?"
[Pour the potion into the wererat's mouth] "Here, take a sip of this first…"
[Kill the wererat]
{n}Hunched, gray figures turn to face you as you approach. Yellow fangs show from grinning muzzles, and clawed paws reach for weapons.{/n}
{n}The wererats freeze in intense anticipation, ready to pounce on you at any moment. Finally, you hear a hoarse, cracked voice.{/n}
{n}The raspy laughter of half a dozen throats resounds over the small clearing.{/n}
"Move one finger – an' we'll cut your bald hide to scraps. Whatcha need?"
"Whatcha… lookin' at… Finish me… off…"

"What, you lookin' to test this stuff on us? Of course – why try it out on people when you've got monsters! Not like anyone's going to miss 'em, right?" {n}Tiny rat eyes glisten with an evil glow.{/n} "Arrogant bastards… Tear 'em apart, boys!"
"Wet-tail. Take the bottle off {mf|him|her}."
{n}The pack leader's snout twists with hatred.{/n} "Die, baldskin!"

{n}The wererats exchange glances, clearly surprised. One of them approaches you and takes the potion. However, as soon as his clawed fist clenches the bottle's neck, he rips out the cork and greedily raises it to his mouth! A gulp, another one, and another... and the wererat falls to the ground, shaking with violent convulsions!{/n}
{n}The pack leader bares his teeth in a sinister grim.{/n} "Not so fast, you pup…"
"That idiot. How predictable." {n}The leader shifts his animal eyes towards you.{/n} "They've killed one of ours. Get 'em, boys."
